line_1: The Christian's dignity thou still preserv'd,
line_2: Nor in thy actions nor thy precepts swerv'd.

line_1: His watchful eye from many a snare preserved,
line_2: Yet well this little page his lord had served,

line_1: His watchful eye from many a snare preserved,
line_2: Nor ever from his steps in any danger swerved.

line_1: Tho' whilst our Labours are preserv'd,
line_2: The Printers may, indeed, be starv'd.

line_1: Their Ignorance of Evil had preserv'd
line_2: Their Joys entire; for then they had not swerv'd.
